about_the_game:
Zehlar is an open world full of secrets and magic. Explore the different biomes, each with its own challenges and rewards, filled with creatures with unique abilities. The world is procedurally generated, so each player can experience a different world.

The creatures in the world have the ability to control different elements, allowing them to adapt to their environment. With their abilities, they can move through the area, protect themselves from threats, or even modify the terrain when necessary.

Humans do not have these powers, but they can acquire some of the creature's abilities through different methods, such as specialized technology. Although they will not be as strong as the powers of the creatures.

It is possible to ally with the creatures in the world. They can help you with many of the tasks and challenges that arise in the world. From building a base, protecting yourself from threats, accessing areas impossible for humans, caring for your crops, or simply helping with household tasks, you can always count on the help of allied creatures.



Both you and your captured creatures will need to train to become stronger and overcome the challenges that will arise in the world. And they can also learn increasingly specialized and more powerful abilities.
